column1: Uchi////Went here to celebrate a birthday and mentioned it when making reservations and again upon arrival. The atmosphere is nothing special and the service is attentive
column2: although I didn't find our waiter pleasant and we were often helped by random waiters passing by (which seems to be the norm and is fine). He continuously tried to up-sell us every single time we ordered something. We took a few of his suggestions
column3: but it got tiresome. When my boyfriend asked if they do anything for birthdays
column6: that's it." Which clearly isn't true
column7: and he could've at least been polite about it and said happy birthday. So
column9: I wouldn't want to be served by him
column10: and I wouldn't go back for a special occasion.
